slides.title: 主歌 1
slides.lyrics:
You are here, moving in our midst
I worship You, I worship You

slides.title: 主歌 2
slides.lyrics:
You are here, working in this place
I worship You, I worship You

slides.title: 副歌
slides.lyrics:
You are Way maker, miracle worker
Promise keeper, light in the darkness
My God, that is who You are

slides.title: 副歌 2
slides.lyrics:
You are here, touching every heart
I worship You, I worship You

slides.title: 主歌 3
slides.lyrics:
You are here, healing every life
I worship You, I worship You

slides.title: 主歌 4
slides.lyrics:
You are Way maker, miracle worker
Promise keeper, light in the darkness
My God, that is who You are

slides.title: 桥
slides.lyrics:
That is who You are
(That is who You are)

slides.title: 桥 2
slides.lyrics:
Even when I don't see it
You're working

slides.title: 桥 3
slides.lyrics:
You never stop
You never stop working

slides.title: 副歌
slides.lyrics:
You are Way maker, miracle worker
Promise keeper, light in the darkness
My God, that is who You are
